ActPublic Service Employment Act
Public Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of DOUGLAS R. EYFORD of Vancouver, British-Columbia, to be special adviser to the Prime Minister to be known as Special Federal Representative on West Coast Energy Infrastructure (“Special Federal Representative”), to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term beginning on March 25, 2013 and ending no later than December 31, 2013.
